title: Jobs Portal
description: Implemented streamlined job portal for effortless job postings and seamless access for seekers. Also, Created a user-friendly recruiter dashboard for effortless job posting, editing, and removal.

title: Notes Portal
description: Created a portal for sharing notes across subjects, which are posted by fellow students. Collaborated with a teammate, cutting development time and boosting project efficiency

title: Netflix Frontend Clone
description: Designed Netflix-like frontend for diverse movie and TV show selection. Integrated ReactJS forthe frontend, utilized Redux for state management, and leveraged Firebase for the backend.
